message: Let's start fair! I'm offering a 60/40 split in my favor. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement quickly.
Your offer was a bit imbalanced. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. Time is money, after all, and we're both losing value with each round.
Okay, let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to split the money evenly. This is the last round I'm offering a 50/50 split, as inflation will start to impact us both significantly.
